captions.text:
VOICE
From lazy Adam Sandler, comes yet

another lazy plotless farted-out
comedy, that America will
inexplicably pay to see...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Grown Ups.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Join an all-star cast of comedic

actors...and Rob Shneider, as they
dish out more of the mindless crap
audiences love:

VOICE (CONT'D)
Pee jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Poop jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Fart jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
More pee jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And...more fart jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Prepare to give up your own hard

earned money to pay for these rich
actors to go on vacation with their
families.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Seriously. This movie cost 80

million dollars, and they shot it
at a lake!

VOICE (CONT'D)
It's lowest common denominator

comedy at it's laziest,
substituting plot, wit, and

character with guys getting hit in
the faces...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Guys getting hit in the foot...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Guys getting hit in the dick...

VOICE (CONT'D)
And even more fart jokes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Journey along with these celebrity

man-babies, as they try to become
grown ups!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Lenny's got Adam Sandler problems:

he's too rich and his wife is too
hot.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Kurt is African American, but he
can't play basketball.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Higgs will have sex with anything,
just like David Spade

VOICE (CONT'D)
Robb has two hot daughters, that
his friends creepily want to bang.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And fat Kevin James is fat.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Did we mention he's totally fat?

VOICE (CONT'D)
Hahaha! (Fart noise)

VOICE (CONT'D)
So get ready for another lazy Adam

Sandler movie full of the things
you've come to expect:

VOICE (CONT'D)
Product placement

VOICE (CONT'D)
Adam Sandler's friends

VOICE (CONT'D)
And jokes so devoid of humor,

creativity, or effort you won't
know when to laugh...but don't
worry, they will!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Alright we got it.

VOICE (CONT'D)
OK, that's enough.

VOICE (CONT'D)
It's really not funny, guys.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Still not funny.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Jeez, it's really not funny.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Starring...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Not Chris Farley

VOICE (CONT'D)
Also Not Chris Farley

VOICE (CONT'D)
Every Movie Hates Chris

VOICE (CONT'D)
Las Bewbs

VOICE (CONT'D)
Adam Sandler's Friend

VOICE (CONT'D)
Whoever that cross-eyed dude is.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And a carrot.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Grown Ups

VOICE (CONT'D)
You know, if you see Grown Ups 2
you're only encouraging him. NOOOOO!

comments.text:
The worst thing is that these "actors" AKA Adam Sandler and friends makes 
more money than most actors for these movies... Happy Madison production 
squeezes in so many Ads and celebrity cameos (not acting, CAMEOS) for these 
movies that they automatically have given themselves money even before the 
movie has premiered because the movie has zero effort putted into making 
it... And since these movies somehow manages to get their audience from 
everywhere, they are continued to be made...
These movies are basically money scams!!! They are like the Italian 
resurant that is the font for money laundrering... SO HORRIBLE!!! ﻿

comments.text:
During an Episode of South Park, they kept showing movie trailers for these 
fake dumb character comedies starring Rob Schneider because in real life he 
was starring in godawful comedies like "The Hot Chick" & "The Animal" or 
whatever it was called, and in one of the Trailers, it said "Roooob 
Schneider is a Carrot!"

YouTube it if you like :) It's quite funny.

"Derp de Derp de Derpity Derp!"
comments.author: Martin Dootson

comments.text:
+Featherman R *ahem* See, South Park made jokes where Cartman and Kenny 
were watching trailers for new Rob Schneider films, parodying The Animal 
and The Hot Chick. The parody trailers said "You saw him as an animal and 
as a woman, and now he's... a carrot!" It then show a montage of Rob as a 
carrot. They did the same with him as a stapler, and then as Kenny.
